docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Bernard Amsterdam, a Manhattan internist who conducted research into the relationship between diet and heart disease, died on Thursday at St. Vincent's Hospital. He was 86 years old and lived in Manhattan. He died of heart failure, his family said.
